description: Alterations to front elevation involving replacement of front door; installation of side lights to front porch, replacement of window to side extension first floor; alterations to side south elevations involving removal of three rooflights, installation of seven rooflights to side south roofslope; installation of window to side north elevation ground floor, relocation of window to side north ground floor,replacement and relocation of rooflight to side north roofslope; alterations to rear elevation involving replacement of ground floor door and window with sliding doors, replacement of door and window with projecting windows and replacement of rear windows on first floor, relocation of one window on rear first floor; installation of canopy to rear elevation ground floor; installation of one rooflight to flat roofslope;, timber cladding to rear ground floor; brick planters
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title numbers: Site Location Plan, 2210_GA00 (Existing Site Plan), 2210_GA01 (Existing Ground Floor Plan), 2210_GA02 (Existing First Floor Plan), 2210_GA03 (Existing Second Floor Plan), 2210_GA04 (Existing Roof Plan), 2210_GA100 (Proposed Site Plan), 2210_GA101 (Proposed Ground Floor Plan), 2210_GA102 (Proposed First Floor Plan), 2210_GA103 (Proposed Second Floor Plan), 2210_GA104 (Proposed Roof Plan), 2210_GE10 (Existing Rear Elevation), 2210_GE11 (Existing Front Elevation), 2210_GE12 (Existing Side (South) Elevation), 2210_GE13 (Existing Side (North) Elevation), 2210_GE110 (Proposed Rear Elevation, Rev A 02.02.2023), 2210_GE111 (Proposed Front Elevation, Rev A 02.02.2023), 2210_GE112 (Proposed Side (South) Elevation), 2210_GE113 (Proposed North elevation).
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).

| The hereby approved seven rooflights to the southern elevation, one to the northern elevation and one to the loft flat roof of the approved development shall not project more than 150mm from the plane of the roof slope when measured perpendicularly and shall be retained as such for the lifetime of the development.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, and to safeguard the character and appearance of the area in accordance with policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and policies 7B and 7.4 of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013).
